General.Name: Madison Metals Inc.
General.Description: Madison Metals Inc., an upstream mining and exploration company, focuses on sustainable uranium production in Namibia and Canada. The company owns 100% interest in the Kenora uranium project that covers approximately 39,850 hectares area located in Ontario. It also holds a 100% interest in the Richards Lake Uranium Project located around Kenora, Ontario; and holds an 85% interest in the Rossing North Uranium project located in the Erongo Province, Namibia, Africa. The company was incorporated in 2019 and is headquartered in Toronto, Canada.
General.Address: 82 Richmond Street East, Toronto, ON, Canada, M5C 1P1
